entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Pickle Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:43 p.m. EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.6Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pickle Lake Airport 2:08 AM EST Sunday 16 April 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.6°C

Visibility: 3 km
Humidity: 90 %

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow mixed with freezing rain. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow with periods of freezing rain early this evening and with ice pellets this evening and overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023
